### Dotbot

Repo: https://github.com/anishathalye/dotbot

```bash
DOTFILES_DIR="$HOME/.local/share/dotfiles"

git clone https://github.com/AVM-Martin/dotfiles $DOTFILES_DIR
$DOTFILES_DIR/.config/dotbot/install
```
